column5: Nice job Gents!!  The pictures look great and I can think of at least a few that will be drooling over the stripers!   Thanks, look forward to seeing the rest of the pictures.
looks like a great day despite the rain.  i love that smallie, i can only dream of one over 5. congrats.  jason
Tell me about it! I have been fishing for smallies about 25 years and never got one over 5Lbs.  LOL

Awesome report and those are some great looking fish!  I know what you mean....I have a 6 year old daughter who loves to fish and I can just sit and watch her as she reels in panfish after panfish all day long!
